trans-unit.source: Enables the user to select a single option from a group of choices when paired with other RadioButton controls.
trans-unit.target: 使用户能够从一组时与其他单选按钮控件成对出现的选项中选择单个选项。

trans-unit.source: The RadioButton control can display text, an <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, or both.
trans-unit.target: RadioButton 控件可以显示文本， <xref:System.Drawing.Image>，和/或文件名。</xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: When the user selects one option button (also known as a radio button) within a group, the others clear automatically.
trans-unit.target: 当用户选择一个选项按钮 （也称为单选按钮），组中的时，其他将自动清除。

trans-unit.source: All RadioButton controls in a given container, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, constitute a group.
trans-unit.target: 所有单选按钮控件在给定容器中，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>，构成一个组。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: To create multiple groups on one form, place each group in its own container, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要在一个窗体上创建多个组，将每个组置于其自己的容器，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>

trans-unit.source: RadioButton and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> controls have a similar function: they offer choices a user can select or clear.
trans-unit.target: 单选按钮和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>控件具有类似的函数︰ 它们提供的选择用户可以选择或清除。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: The difference is that multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> controls can be selected at the same time, but option buttons are mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target: 区别是，多个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>控件可以选择在同一时间，但是互相排斥的选项按钮。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A> property to get or set the state of a RadioButton.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A>属性来获取或设置的状态的单选按钮。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: The option button's appearance can be altered to appear as a toggle-style button or as a standard option button by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Appearance%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 可以更改选项按钮的外观以作为切换式按钮或标准的选项按钮出现通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Appearance%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Appearance%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The default view of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> has its text aligned to the right of the button and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.AutoCheck%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 默认视图<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>具有右侧的按钮对齐其文本和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.AutoCheck%2A>属性设置为`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.AutoCheck%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value determining the appearance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定的外观<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If the Appearance value is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance>, then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control is drawn with a circular check box.
trans-unit.target: 如果外观值设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance>，则<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>循环的复选框以绘制控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance>

trans-unit.source: If the value is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance>, then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> is drawn as a control that can be toggled to an up or down state.
trans-unit.target: 如果值设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance>，则<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>绘制为可切换的控件为向上或向下状态。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance>

trans-unit.source: Either type can display text, an image, or both.
trans-unit.target: 任一类型可以显示文本、 图像，或两者。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Appearance"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Appearance"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Appearance"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Appearance"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Appearance"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 所赋的值不是之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Appearance"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Appearance*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Appearance*>属性值更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Appearance*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked*> value and the appearance of the control automatically change when the control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked*>值和控件的外观时自动更改控件时发生。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked*>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A> value is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> portion of the control must be checked in code in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A>值设置为`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>的控件部分，必须签入中的代码<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>事件处理程序。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control group, this property ensures that only one of the controls is checked at a given time.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>属于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>控件组，此属性可确保在给定时间只能有一个控件被检查。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>

trans-unit.source: If the AutoCheck property is set to `false`, a group of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controls will not act as a mutually exclusive group and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A> property must be updated in code.
trans-unit.target: 如果 AutoCheck 属性设置为`false`、 组<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>控件将不能充当互相排斥的组和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A>属性必须在代码中更新。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked*> value and the appearance of the control automatically change on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"></xref> event; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked*>值和控件的外观上自动更改<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"></xref>事件; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked*>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of the check box portion of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的位置的复选框部分<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: One of the valid <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 一个有效<xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not one of the <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 所赋的值不是之一<xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is checked.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否已选中控件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the check box is checked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果选中复选框;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的辅助功能对象为<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the CreateAccessibilityInstance method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: 如果不显式调用 CreateAccessibilityInstance 方法，它时将会调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>引用属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property, you must add a reference to the <xref:Accessibility> assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 要获取或设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>属性，必须添加对引用<xref:Accessibility>随.NET Framework 一起安装的程序集。</xref:Accessibility> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.RadioButtonAccessibleObject> for the control.
trans-unit.target: 一个新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.RadioButtonAccessibleObject>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.RadioButtonAccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: 创建控件句柄时，请获取需要的创建参数。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"></xref> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"> </xref> ，其中包含需要的创建参数时创建该控件的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件的默认大小。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> with a <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*> of 104 and a <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*> of 24.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>与<> *1> 的 104 和<> *1> 的 24。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 当用户双击时发生<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> style bit is set to `false` for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control, and the DoubleClick event is not raised.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>样式位设置为`false`为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>控件，并不会引发事件的 DoubleClick。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"></xref> control with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 当用户双击时发生<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"></xref>使用鼠标控件。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> style bit is set to `false` for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control, and the MouseDoubleClick event is not raised.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>样式位设置为`false`为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>控件，并不会引发事件 MouseDoubleClick。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckedChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckedChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The OnCheckedChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnCheckedChanged 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.AutoCheck%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A> property is set to `true` when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.AutoCheck%2A>属性设置为`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A>属性设置为`true`时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>控件被单击。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.AutoCheck%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: If the user enters the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control by using the arrow keys, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> will raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户输入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>控件通过使用箭头键，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>将引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleCreated*> method.
trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleCreated*>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleCreated*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The OnMouseUp method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnMouseUp 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Generates a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"></xref> event for the control, simulating a click by a user.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"></xref>控件，模拟用户的单击事件。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessMnemonic*> method.
trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessMnemonic*>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessMnemonic*>

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: 要处理的字符。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was successfully processed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果字符已成功处理;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can give the focus to this control using the TAB key.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户是否可以使用 TAB 键此控件提供焦点。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can give focus to this control using the TAB key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果用户可以将焦点移至使用 TAB 键; 此控件否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the text on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置文本的对齐方式上<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 分配的值不是之一<xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.ToString*> method.
trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.ToString*>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.ToString*>

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"></xref> that indicates whether it is checked.
trans-unit.target: 字符串表示形式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"> </xref> ，该值指示是否对其进行检查。
